bibl.idno: The Papers of Henry Rose Carter [manuscript] ; HEALTHSCI MS-10.

bibl.title: Postcard from Ronald Ross to Henry Rose Carter, December 8, 1914

div1.p: Ross thanks Carter for the reprints of his yellow fever lectures.

div1.head: Postcard from Ronald Ross to Henry Rose Carter, December 8, 1914
div1.opener:
SCIENCE PROGRESS
Published Quarterly by John Murray
From the Editor
SIR RONALD ROSS, K.C.B. F.R.S., D.Sc.
Telephone : MAYFAIR 6328
18 CAVENDISH SQUARE,
LONDON, W.
8th December, 1914
div1.p:
Many thanks for reprints of excellent
lectures on yellow fever. Will be very
useful. Compliments of the Season.
div1.closer:
Ronald Ross
LONDON. W.
POST CARD
LONDON. W.
POSTAGE REVENUE
1 ONE PENNY 1
2. -- PM
8 DEC 14B
ADDRESS ONLY TO BE WRITTEN ON THIS SIDE
2. -- PM
8 DEC 14B
PUBLIC HEALTH SERVICE
ADDRESS CHANGED BY REASON OF
OFFICIAL ORDERS.
WASHING
DEC 26
10 PM
1914
Dr. H. R. Carter,
Senior Surgeon United States Public Health
Service,
WASHINGTON.
U. S. A.
Baltimore
Md
